game_description: Reflecto Ray is a puzzle game that combines creativity and challenge with interactive gaming experience in VR. It challenges players to guide ray into the final destination by guessing the mirror's direction. The journey started when humankind suffered from devils. To stop them, people found a way by using magic tools that turned the devils to stone. These magic tools get electric power from power stations installed in every city and your mission to keep it running. Immersive yourself by discovering the right road of the ray by redirecting the mirrors inside the wonder atmosphere and engaging soundtracks that create a feeling of blissful exploration, contemplative reflection.
review_1: Game looks fun. But I could not for the life of me figure out the controls. Please add directions or tutorial. Nice graphics. Nice gameplay from what I can play. Great game idea! Will revisit rating after this is addressed. Thank you for the game!! Good job!
review_2: I can't figure out the controls. I can only grab the reflectors but can't move it and my character can't move. I've tried all the combination of controls. Very frustrating.
review_3: I don’t understand how this game has such a low rating, this is some of my favorite types of games. Yes it may not be for everyone but if you’ve ever played a laser like game on your phone this is exactly the same thing just in VR. The only negative thing I see if the controls, it would be so much better if we could have smooth locomotion instead of teleport. And possibly even a couple tutorials.
